author: Matt Zapotosky, John Wagner, Marisa Iati
title: Coronavirus pandemic could kill as many as 200,000 in U.S., White House warns - The Washington Post
description: Trump’s senior coronavirus coordinators says that the pandemic will kill many more people in even a best-case scenario as more states issue stay-at-home orders.
content:
As deaths across the world from covid-19 climbed above 37,000 and those in the United States rose to more than 2,900, federal and state officials offered grim warnings that the country should expect things to get worse before they get better.
